reviews.text: I went to Waiheke Island for a wedding with my mum. Finding a place for only one night and with twin bed configuration was not easy, but I stumbled upon The Courtyard through a website and booked. It is very reasonably priced and located only minutes (walking) to the township of Oneroa.
reviews.title: Great base to enjoy Waiheke from

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Jilly, the host, is great and the unit with ensuite was very clean and comfortable. Being summer, a fan and mosquito repeller was considerately provided and appreciated.
reviews.title: The Courtyard on Waiheke Island- We loved it !!!

likes.liked: — Clean, affordable and close to beach and places to ead
